synopsis.text: In the next chapter of this thrilling anime, Kaito Daimon and his team, having triumphed over the POG, face a new formidable adversary: the Orpheus Order. This sinister group is hell-bent on exploiting the power of the Orpheus amulet, believing it to be the key to unlocking humanity's full potential, regardless of the lethal consequences. As the complexity and danger of the puzzles escalate, Kaito and his companions must navigate treacherous traps, risking not only their lives but also their sanity. With the stakes higher than ever and the future of humanity hanging in the balance, Kaito must outwit the Orpheus Order, even as they target him for discarding his own amulet. The puzzle battles intensify in this new season, promising a rollercoaster ride of intellect and suspense.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
